title: Chicken liver pâté
description: The Hairy Bikers serve up this creamy chicken liver pâté as part of an Eastern European smorgasboard, it also makes wonderful party food or a tasty starter if you have friends over for dinner.
ingredients: ½ small onion or one shallot, finely chopped
1 sprig fresh thyme, leaves picked and finely chopped
3 allspice berries, finely ground (available online and in some supermarkets)
